onboarding.title: Welcome To Mix Cafe
onboarding.body: Discover a world of flavor where a restaurant, a cafe, and a juice bar meet in one place.

onboarding.title: A Memorable Dining Experience
onboarding.body: Browse our diverse menus, from breakfast to dinner, and order your favorite dishes with ease.

onboarding.title: Your Coffee Awaits
onboarding.body: Enjoy moments of tranquility with your favorite cup of coffee, from rich espresso to luxurious latte.

onboarding.title: Fresh & Natural Juices
onboarding.body: Revitalize with our wide selection of fresh, natural juices. Perfect for any time of the day.

onboarding.title: Seamless Control For You
onboarding.body: Track your orders, review your purchase history, and save your favorites for quick reordering.

onboarding.title: Smart Business Management
onboarding.body: For our business partners: our admin dashboard provides instant insights and comprehensive reports to manage your business efficiently.

selectUserRole.business: Please Choose Your Role To Continue

adminHomeScreen.title: Mix Cafe Admin
adminHomeScreen.weekGuide: Track your restaurant's weekly sales performance
adminHomeScreen.noBestSellersGuide: This List Will Populate With Your Top-Selling Products As Sales Data Comes In. Ensure Your Products Are Well-Stocked And Promoted To See Them Here.

adminCategoriesScreen.title: Categories Management
adminCategoriesScreen.emptyProductsGuide: Your Product List Is Currently Empty. Add New Products To Start Selling And Managing Your Inventory.

adminCategoriesScreen.deleteCategoryGuide: Are you sure you want to delete this category?

adminOrdersScreen.title: Orders Management

adminOrdersScreen.deleteOrderGuide: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this order? This action cannot be undone.

adminOffersScreen.title: Offers Management
adminOffersScreen.emptyOffersGuide: Create New Offers And Promotions To Attract More Customers And Boost Sales.
